name: lms
description: An Online Learning Management System (LMS) is a web-based platform that facilitates  the delivery of educational courses and training programs. It provides a virtual learning  environment where students can access course materials, submit assignments, and  take assessments.  run npm-install in frontend appsettings.json >> Connection String >> myConnection >>write your own server name in sql >> go to  you can find your server by >> open sql server >> get your Server Name run update-database in backend
